string-array.name: qty_ans
string-array.item: 1) Writing a good title and description. Your listing\'s title and description are your advertisement for the item you\'re selling an opportunity to inform and excite buyers. A good title and description provide a clear picture of your item and increase your chances that buyers will find and bid on or buy your item.
